Although the area of the bat caverns in which you find yourself appears to be deserted, you suddenly hear the unmistakable sound of someone shuffling about coming from somewhere up ahead. Approaching with caution, you turn a corner and see [npc.a_fullRace(true)] a short way up ahead, who's crouched down and appears to be pulling at something on the floor.

Seeing that [npc.sheIs] focusing on a patch of glowing mushrooms, you quickly assume that [npc.sheIs] some kind of mycologist, and must be foraging for edible, or more likely psychedelic, mushrooms. #IF(npc.isConfident()) As [npc.she] notices your approach, the [npc.race] looks over at you, and in a confident tone, confirms your suspicions, [npc.speech(Hey there, just me a moment to gather this! From [npc.her] reaction, it's quite apparent that [npc.sheHas] recognised you as well, and as [npc.her] [npc.hands] reach up to cover [npc.her] [npc.mouth] in shock, you're left to decide how best to respond...
